itt.t00154755.mouseapp

Class Client.ClientCommsThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • itt.t00154755.mouseapp.Client.ClientCommsThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientCommsInterface, java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    Client

    private class Client.ClientCommsThread
extends java.lang.Thread
implements ClientCommsInterface
    Author:
    Christopher Donovan This the private inner class that extends Thread each time this class is called a new thread is created. This class creates an Output Stream using the btSocket and fires the data to the server.
